cinnamon.engine.gfx

Interface Drawable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Position, Rotation, Size
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageComponent

    public interface Drawable
extends Position, Size, Rotation

    Drawables carry information needed for something to be drawn such as a Texture's id, the size to draw with, and more.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTexture()
      Gets the Texture id of the image to draw.
      Color getTint()
      Copies the color tint to a given Color.
      float getTransparency()
      Gets the transparency, or alpha, amount.
      boolean isFlippedHorizontally()
      Checks if the texture should be flipped horizontally.
      boolean isFlippedVertically()
      Checks if the texture should be flipped vertically.

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Position

        getX, getY, getZ

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Size

        getDepth, getHeight, getWidth

      • Methods inherited from interface cinnamon.engine.utils.Rotation

        getRotation

        boolean isFlippedVertically()

        Checks if the texture should be flipped vertically.
